description: Jib the park before cutting over to slay the sidecountry on a ski that responds as fast as you do. Rossignol’s Trixie model is an agile all-mountain freestyle twin tip that gives you durability while you reach your peak. A wood and fibreglass core extends playtime while traditional camber and an extended sidecut deliver power and edge grip while still improving rotation at lower speeds. A rounded jib tip with a rubber layer for shock absorption has you ready to tackle park and pipe or ski switch.Cap construction.Wood core with fibreglass reinforcement gives you flexibility.Extended sidecut improves grip and handling as well as rotation at lower speeds.Rounded jib tip has a rounder tip shape and rubber layer for pipe and park transitions and skiing switch while giving you great shock absorption and durability.Includes women’s specific Look XPress 10 lightweight and tool-free bindings with a 2.5-10 DIN range.
name: Rossignol Trixie Skis + Bindings - Girls' - Children to Youths
